D

DEFAULT_BATCH_SIZE - Static variable in class io.hekate.metrics.statsd.StatsdMetricsConfig
Default value (=10) for StatsdMetricsConfig.setBatchSize(int).
DEFAULT_PORT - Static variable in class io.hekate.metrics.statsd.StatsdMetricsConfig
Default value (=8125) for StatsdMetricsConfig.setPort(int).
DEFAULT_QUEUE_SIZE - Static variable in class io.hekate.metrics.statsd.StatsdMetricsConfig
Default value (=100) for StatsdMetricsConfig.setMaxQueueSize(int).

G

getBatchSize() - Method in class io.hekate.metrics.statsd.StatsdMetricsConfig
Returns the maximum number of metrics that should be placed into a single UDP packet (see StatsdMetricsConfig.setBatchSize(int)).
getFilter() - Method in class io.hekate.metrics.statsd.StatsdMetricsConfig
Returns the metrics publishing filter (see StatsdMetricsConfig.setFilter(MetricFilter)).
getHost() - Method in class io.hekate.metrics.statsd.StatsdMetricsConfig
Returns the host address of a StatsD daemon (see StatsdMetricsConfig.setHost(String)).
getMaxQueueSize() - Method in class io.hekate.metrics.statsd.StatsdMetricsConfig
Returns the maximum size of a queue to buffer metrics for asynchronous publishing (see StatsdMetricsConfig.setMaxQueueSize(int)).
getPort() - Method in class io.hekate.metrics.statsd.StatsdMetricsConfig
Returns the network port of a StatsD daemon (see StatsdMetricsConfig.setPort(int)).

I

install(HekateBootstrap) - Method in class io.hekate.metrics.statsd.StatsdMetricsPlugin
 
io.hekate.metrics.statsd - package io.hekate.metrics.statsd
Support for metrics publishing to StatsD.
